    Items[edit]

    Aeon Disk[edit]

    • Cooldown increased from 90 to 115

    Echo Sabre[edit]

    • Strength bonus increased from 10 to 12
    • Damage bonus reduced from 15 to 12
    • Slow duration increased from 0.7 to 0.8

    Hand of Midas[edit]

    • Cooldown reduced from 95 to 90

    Orb of Venom[edit]

    • Damage per second reduced from 5 to 3 on ranged heroes

    Maelstrom[edit]

    • Chain Lightning damage reduced from 170 to 160

    Heroes[edit]

    Abaddon[edit]

    • Base﻿ movement speed increased from 305 to 310

    Alchemist[edit]

    • Greevil's Greed Gold Bonus Cap increased from 16/20/24/28 to 20/24/28/32
    • Greevil's Greed Stack Duration increased from 30 to 40

    Ancient Apparition[edit]

    • Ice Blast duration increased from 8/9/10 to 9/10/11

    Bane[edit]

    • Fiend's Grip cooldown increased from 100 to 120/110/100

    Beastmaster[edit]

    • Wild Axes mana cost increased from 80 to 80/85/90/95
    • Primal Roar cooldown increased from 80/75/70 to 90/80/70
    • Level 10 Talent reduced from +25 Movement Speed to +20
    • Level 15 Talent reduced from +7 Armor to +6
    • Level 20 Talent reduced from +100 Wild Axes Damage to +80

    Bloodseeker[edit]

    • Level 10 Talent reduced from +8 Armor to +6
    • Level 15 Talent reduced from +300 Health to +275

    Centaur Warrunner[edit]

    • Base strength increased by 2

    Chen[edit]

    • Holy Persuasion cast range reduced from 900 to 600
    • Holy Persuasion send back delay rescaled from 6/5/4/3 to 6
    • Holy Persuasion cooldown increased from 10 to 32/24/18/10

    Clinkz[edit]

    • Strafe cooldown reduced from 45/35/25/15 to 30/25/20/15
    • Strafe mana cost reduced from 90 to 75/80/85/90

    Clockwerk[edit]

    • Power Cogs burn/damage reduced from 80/120/160/200 to 50/100/150/200

    Crystal Maiden[edit]

    • Crystal Nova damage increased from 100/150/200/250 to 130/170/210/260
    • Arcane Aura self mana regen increased from 1.6/2.4/3.2/4 to 1.8/2.6/3.4/4.2

    Dark Willow[edit]

    • Bramble Maze total damage increased from 100/150/200/250 to 140/180/220/260
    • Cursed Crown mana cost reduced from 100/120/140/160 to 80/100/120/140

    Dazzle[edit]

    • Base damage spread reduced from 41-59 to 47-53
    • Poison Touch damage rescaled from 10/24/38/52 to 16/28/40/52

    Death Prophet[edit]

    • Base armor reduced by 1

    Doom[edit]

    • Base movement speed reduced from 285 to 280

    Dragon Knight[edit]

    • Level 15 Talent reduced from +35 Damage to +30

    Earthshaker[edit]

    • Base HP regen increased from 2 to 2.5
    • Base movement speed increased from 305 to 310
    • Enchant Totem Scepter cast range increased from 900 to 1100
    • Echo Slam Echo damage increased from 60/85/110 to 70/90/110
    • Echo Slam waves are no longer disjointable

    Earth Spirit[edit]

    • Strength gain increased from 3.2 to 3.5

    Ember Spirit[edit]

    • Fire Remnant charge restore time increased from 35 to 38

    Enchantress[edit]

    • Attack range increased from 550 to 575
    • Untouchable attack slow increased from -20/60/100/140 to -20/70/120/170
    • Impetus damage increased from 14/18/22% to 16/20/24%

    Enigma[edit]

    • Midnight Pulse damage increased from 3/3.75/4.5/5.25% to 3.75/4.﻿25/4.75/5.2﻿5%
    • Midnight Pulse duration rescaled from 11 to 9/10/11/12
    • Midnight Pulse cooldown rescaled from 35 to 50/45/40/35﻿
    • Midnight Pulse mana cost rescaled from 95/110/125/140 to 75/95/115/135
    • Level 15 Talent increased from +120 Gold/Min to +150﻿
    • Level 20 Talent increased from +400 Health to +500 Health
    • Level 25 Talent increased from +4 Malefice Instance to +5﻿

    Invoker[edit]

    • Level 10 Talent increased from +0.5s Tornado Lift Time to +1.25s
    • Level 15 Talent changed from +2.5s Cold Snap Duration to -12s Cold Snap Cooldown

    Io[edit]

    • Relocate now has channel time instead of a cast delay

    Legion Commander[edit]

    • Duel bonus damage increased from 10/14/18 to 10/18/26

    Leshrac[edit]

    • Split Earth cast range reduced from 750 to 650

    Lich[edit]

    • Sacrifice 25 mana cost removed
    • Ice Armor increased from 3/5/7/9 to 4/6/8/10
    • Chain Frost cast point reduced from 0.4 to 0.3

    Lycan[edit]

    • Base armor reduced by 2
    • Base damage reduced by 3

    Meepo[edit]

    • Base armor increased by 2﻿

    Mirana[edit]

    • Level 10 Talent reduced from +20 Damage to +15
    • Level 25 Talent reduced from -75s Moonlight Shadow Cooldown to -70s

    Morphling[edit]

    • Waveform cooldown increased from 11 to 14/13/12/11

    Naga Siren[edit]

    • Rip Tide damage reduced from 120/160/200/240 to 80/130/180/230
    • Ensnare cooldown increased from 12 to 14

    Nature's Prophet[edit]

    • Agility gain increased from 1.9 to 2.4

    Necrophos[edit]

    • Death Pulse damage increased from 80/120/160/200 to 100/140/180/220
    • Death Pulse unit kill regen duration increased from 6 to 7

    Night Stalker[edit]

    • Void now deals half damage during day
    • Base movement speed reduced from 290 to 285

    Nyx Assassin[edit]

    • Vendetta mana cost decreased from 160/210/260 to 140/200/260

    Oracle[edit]

    • Intelligence growth increased from 3.2 to 3.5

    Phantom Lancer[edit]

    • Base strength reduced by 3

    Pudge[edit]

    • Meat Hook cast range increased from 1000/1100/1200/1300 to 1300
    • Flesh Heap magic resistance increased from 6/8/10/12% to 8/10/12/14%

    Riki[edit]

    • Base damage increased by 3
    • Blink Strike damage rescaled from 55/70/85/100 to 100
    • Blink Strike cast range rescaled from 800 to 500/600/700/800
    • Smoke Screen AoE increased from 250/275/300/325 to 325

    Sand King[edit]

    • Burrowstrike cooldown increased from 11 to 14/13/12/11﻿

    Shadow Shaman[edit]

    • Mass Serpent Ward damage increased from 40/70/100 to 50/75/100

    Skywrath Mage[edit]

    • Arcane Bolt mana cost increased from 70 to 90

    Slark[edit]

    • Level 10 Talent reduced from +10 Agility to +8

    Sniper[edit]

    • Headshot physical damage no longer ignores Spell Immune units
    • Headshot damage increased from 15/40/65/90 to 20/50/80/110

    Sven[edit]

    • Great Cleave damage increased from 30/42/54/66 to 40/50/60/70

    Templar Assassin[edit]

    • Psionic Trap bounty increased from 1 to 25

    Terrorblade[edit]

    • Agility gain increased from 3.7 to 4.2

    Tidehunter[edit]

    • Gush armor reduction increased from 3/4/5/6 to 4/5/6/7
    • Ravage duration increased from 2/2.4/2.8 to 2.4/2.6/2.8
    • Level 20 Talent increased from -4 Gush Armor to -5
    • Level 20 Talent increased from +24 Kraken Shell Damage Block to +30

    Timbersaw[edit]

    • Whirling Death stat loss percentage increased from 13% to 15%

    Tiny[edit]

    • Strength growth increased from 3.3 to 3.6
    • Tree Grab unit attack damage bonus increased from 10/20/30/40% to 25/30/35/40%
    • Tree Grab building attack damage rescaled from 90/120/150/180% to 80/120/160/200%
    • Toss damage increased from 75/150/225/300 to 90/160/230/300

    Ursa[edit]

    • Overpower attack count increased from 3/4/5/6 to 4/5/6/7
    • Level 20 Talent increased from +12 Fury Swipes Damage to +16

    Vengeful Spirit[edit]

    • Wave of Terror damage rescaled from 45/70/95/120 to 60/80/100/120
    • Magic Missile stun duration rescaled from 1.2/1.4/1.6/1.8 to 1.5/1.6/1.7/1.8

    Warlock[edit]

    • Shadow Word mana cost increased from 90/110/130/150 to 120/130/140/150
    • Shadow Word cast range reduced from 525/600/675/750 to 450/550/650/750 ﻿﻿

    Weaver[edit]

    • Agility gain increased from 2.8 to 3.1
    • Shukuchi damage increased from 80/110/140/170 to 100/125/150/175

    Windranger[edit]

    • Intelligence reduced by 2
    • Powershot reduced from 180/270/360/450 to 150/250/350/450

    Witch Doctor[edit]

    • Voodoo Restoration activation cost increased from 20/30/40/50 to 35/40/45/50

    Wraith King[edit]

    • Mortal Strike skeletons magic resistance increased from 30% to 50%
    • Vampiric Aura increased from 15/20/25/30% to 18/22/26/30%

    External Links[edit]

    • Dota 2 Update - June 25th 2018
